participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.
i once started a forest fire in california.
i am interested in producing music.
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.

participant_2.background:
I work as a waiter and try my best to be a good father.
My most valued material possession is the notebook I keep my short stories in.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
i graduated from princeton.

content.text: Hey there, how was your day?
Hey, it was good! I went to the park with my son and we had a lot of fun.
Nice! I'm glad to hear that. I am a fan of Disney movies. What are some of your favorites?
I love a lot of them, but I would have to say my favorite is The Little Mermaid.
Ooh, that's a good one. I love Ariel. I think I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
That's a great idea! I'm sure your baby would love it.
Thank you! I'm looking forward to having a family someday.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you'll be a great parent.
Thank you! I appreciate that. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a waiter at a local restaurant.
Oh, cool! I've always thought that would be a fun job.
It can be, but it can also be pretty stressful.
I can imagine. What's your most valued material possession?
My notebook that I keep my short stories in.
That's a cool answer! I'm a writer too. What kind of stories do you write?
I write all different kinds of stories, but I mostly write fantasy and science fiction.
Nice! I love those genres. I've written a few short stories myself, but I've never been brave enough to publish any of them.
You should! You never know what might happen.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement
